summary: Cloud and Data Engineer with a strong foundation in Microsoft Azure ecosystems and Infrastructure as Code (IaC). Specialized in designing scalable data pipelines and managing containerized applications. Experienced in automating CI/CD workflows and optimizing cloud infrastructure to drive operational efficiency and data accessibility.

experience.title: Cloud Engineer
experience.description: Specializing in Azure-based cloud infrastructure and data engineering solutions.
responsibilities: Optimizing Microsoft Azure IaaS environments, resulting in improved resource allocation and cost-efficiency for client projects.
Developing and maintaining automated data pipelines using Azure Data Factory to streamline the flow of raw transactional data.
Managing container orchestration using Docker and Kubernetes to ensure high availability for microservices-based applications.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement secure IAM policies and Azure AD governance for enterprise-level cloud architectures.
Automating deployment cycles using GitHub Actions and Jenkins, reducing manual intervention in the delivery pipeline.

education.institution: Galgotias College of Engineering and Technology

skills: Azure Data Factory, Azure Databricks, Azure IaaS, Azure AD, GCP
SQL, Python, PySpark, Pandas, MS SQL, OracleDB, Teradata
Terraform, Ansible, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, CI/CD, DevOps
Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Docker Compose, Big Data, Kafka, Spark, Hive
RESTful API, Apigee X, Apigee Edge, Swagger/OpenAPI, TypeScript, Next.js

certifications.title: Google Cloud Certified Associate Cloud Engineer
certifications.skills: Cloud Architecture, Cloud Security, GCP, IAM, IaC, Networking

certifications.title: GitHub Foundations
certifications.skills: Repository Management, Collaborative Workflows, CI/CD, DevOps

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate
certifications.skills: Azure Identities, Storage Management, Compute Resources, Virtual Networking

projects.title: Open-source Subtitle Generation Tool
projects.description: Engineered an AI-powered processing pipeline using Python and OpenAI's Whisper model. Implemented automated data handling for 20+ models, gaining 426+ GitHub stars.
projects.technologies: Python, Whisper AI, Machine Learning, Shell Scripting

projects.title: AutoApplys Automation Platform
projects.description: Developed a web-based platform to automate job application workflows, integrating MongoDB for scalable data storage and Next.js for the frontend.

projects.title: Whisper RESTful API
projects.description: Designed and deployed a RESTful API to process audio files into text, utilizing Python to manage high-concurrency transcription requests.
